summary:
Member of the Dance Company "The Dance Theatre of Egypt”  (Sadlers’s Wells, London) The Netherlands, (Rasa, Utrecht, Tropeninstituut, Amsterdam).
Member of Sarah Kahan Company, London.
Solo dancer in many occasions.
See www.egyptiandance.nl  

My aim is to work as a teacher, dancer and choreographer  of Arabic/ Egyptian music and dance also called as Belly dance, with its endless possibilites.
To provide opportunities for performing for professional and amateur dancers for women of ALL LEVEL AND AGE .  
To spread a love of dance and for the performing arts as :
a way to promote positive social values,
a way to communicate a sensitivity for beauty, a respect  and esteem for the body, for the mind, for the soul ,
a platform for research, ideas, innovations.

Specialties: Creating opportunities for dancing
Connecting with people

profile_positions.description:
I am in charge of teaching and directing the Performance Group for talented amateur dancers.
The Performance Group is open to anyone seriously interested in growing artistically in Egyptian Dance. Attitude is more important than technical level. The group does not want to encourage competition and perfectionism for its own sake but we want to awaken growth and positive social values through the performing arts. We will work towards choreographies to perform for the Suite in the LAKtheater or other occasions such as Dance Festivals possibly with live Arabic music. Everyone who is enrolled in one of the previous levels of Egyptian dance or from other Belly dance courses can apply. There will be an audition day on the 9th and 10th of Sept starting at 19h30. For application and more information please contact info@egyptiandance.nl
profile_positions.title: Teacher and choreographer of Egyptian Bellydance
